column4: I can't find any good video editors for Ubuntu; Kino doesn't work because i don't have firewire on here, all I have is a capture card
I used to make more than enough movies when I used windows, but when I installed ubuntu
what kind of video editing? cutting and pasting clips and such?
check out if avidemux suits you.
avidemux has many options for "advanced" editing, but isn't good for cutting and pasting many clips.
what utility can I find that records video from my capture card?
i don't know. vlc comes to mind, but i don't really know.
what the crap, cinelerra crashed, and now Computer Janitor wants to clean it away from my system
i don't know who this janitor is. i don't have one.
my opinion of it wasn't too stellar, either, after very brief exposure.
perhaps it has its own irc channel. it's not supported here.
if you didn't get that, never mind. i must be old.
